answerText: accelerating [accept word forms and logical equivalents, e.g. the speed of expansion is increasing, etc.][10] Both Perlmutter and Schmidt and Riess relied on the measurements of the light curves of the Type Ia of these events, whose identical underlying process allows them to serve as standard candles.
heading: MAGNI |2011 | 1 | 18 | Science | Physics | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Answer some questions about the most recent Nobel Prize in physics, for 10 points each. [10] The prize went to Saul Perlmutter, Brian Schmidt, and Adam Riess for demonstrating that the expansion of the universe was undergoing this process.
